mapper.sql: num, title, writer, orgFileName, fileSize, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS regdate
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM (SELECT num, writer, title, orgFileName, saveFileName, fileSize, regdate FROM board_data
OR writer LIKE '%'||#{writer}||'%'
OR title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
OR orgFileName LIKE '%'||#{orgFileName}||'%'
ORDER BY num DESC ) result1 ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
